## Carry Recipe
_No-Sew Ring Sling – Base Size Minus 5 – Traditional Sling Pass_
- Thread one tail through two rings and back under the outside ring
- Place short tail on shoulder with rings in corsage position
- Wrap around back and under arm
- Thread tail through both rings and back under the outside ring like a normal ring sling
